title: Agentuity Snapshot Build File
description: Schema for agentuity-snapshot.yaml files that define reproducible sandbox environments. Build with: agentuity cloud sandbox snapshot build <directory>. Note: At least one of dependencies, files, or env must be specified.

runtime.description: Runtime identifier (name:tag format, e.g., bun:1, node:20, python:3.12)

dependencies.description: List of apt packages to install. Supports version pinning: package=version or package=version* for prefix matching

files.description: Glob patterns for files to include from the build context. Supports negative patterns with ! prefix for exclusions

env.description: Environment variables to set. Use ${VAR} syntax for build-time substitution via --env flag

metadata.description: User-defined metadata key-value pairs. Use ${VAR} syntax for build-time substitution via --metadata flag

public.description: Whether to make the snapshot publicly accessible (default: false)
